title: Lets brainstorm
body:
We need another use for IP, i want to get my friends together and stuff for double IP weekends etc but i just don't care enough to because i have too much. theres nothing to strive for, i have all the champs and all that etc. can we please consider something else to spend IP on, even if its like a different font for the chat or something, or loading screen banners, if they project ones are up why cant there be purchasable ones? maybe make icons 10000 IP or something, or perhaps chroma packs 25000, as long as theres something to save up for and buy. 

So lets brainstorm a few things that might be possibilities,
remember lets keep it real, firstly skins will never be up for grabs, Riot has to make money somehow, secondly gifting to friends is out of the question, that'll stop friends using RP for champs and i don't think riot will like that either, but apart from those lets see what we can come up with? maybe some new fresh idea might be seen and put forward.

Alright here's an idea. We have an "achievement" system similar to the steam item one, where you earn them in game randomly, and then have the option to buy and sell with IP or RP. Some achievements will be rarer than others (e.g only for special events), and are displayed on a special tab on your profile.

Maybe even collecting all the achievements for a certain champion could unlock you a chroma-pack. It might encourage players to spend more RP, while giving poor players with lots of time the ability to earn RP. The item market place would also be an awesome social/economic experiment.

Good or nah?

I think this is a great idea, perhaps hard achievements like getting a pentakill with a champion allow the option to unlock a chroma with IP for that champ. (or maybe an icon, which would be easier for riot I'm guessing)

yeah chromas should be something purchasable with IP, or at least just the ones that are for the classic skin

I still have a few champions to get that I MAY use here or there, but some that I will never use. One day I will have them all and I will be in the same boat as the rest of you, what next?

During my time over the years I have really wasted IP on runes, buying, combining and finding the best ones for me so i only have a little IP for now, but never actually wanted to spend it on any champions as I did not ever see myself using them.

Now what to do, renting seems the best idea. You rent something for 1, 3, 5 games and see if you like it, OUTSIDE ranked if you are renting champions, that gives you a chance to try before you buy and a reason to play more, you don't have to spend RP or wait for free weeks for that champ you want to try that is never free.

Although if you do that, what do you have to look forward to other than the ladder climb in ranked? You play a lot, try everything with IP, than get bored faster knowing that those champs you thought about are actually not to your style and therefore the IP you could have spent on them, will not be. Than you have more IP just gaining for nothing.

Put community skins in that you can buy for IP, that will give us all something to play for.
